content.name: Torpedo
content.description: Gravity-affected projectile fired from ships. Limited lifetime. Inherits ship velocity plus muzzle velocity in facing direction.
content.lore: The primary weapon in Spacewar! battles. Torpedoes curve gracefully through space under the star's gravitational influence, creating strategic depth.
content.gameplay_notes: Original game allowed 32 torpedoes per ship. Lifetime of 140 ticks (~2.3 seconds at 60Hz). Affected by central star gravity.
